DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : To evaluate whether use single incision un-anchored small mesh implant feasible , safe effective woman moderate pelvic organ prolapse . Design : Patients diagnose moderate pelvic organ prolapse enrol undergo single incision un-anchored mesh operation . Follow-up 4 23 month . The outcome measure study operative safety post-operative pain , adverse effect anatomical well functional cure . Setting : The operation perform general anesthesia accord report surgical technique university private hospital .
DOC.brief_title: Single Incision Pelvic Floor Mesh Implants
DOC.detailed_description: Eligibility criterion : female patient moderate pelvic organ prolapse Outcome measure : intra operative safety surgical complication , post operative complication objective well subjective cure rate
DOC.criteria: * Patients Gr 23 Pelvic Organ Prolapse *Previous Pelvic irradiation
